field.name: types
field.description: A set of notification types (node must match at least one) to include in the search results, such as android-notification or ios-notification.

field.name: app_ref
field.description: An app node ref that a notification must be linked with to match the search request.

field.name: content_ref
field.description: A content node ref that a notification must be linked with to match the search request.
